Reverse image search: The expert performed a reverse image search using InVid and found that the same video clip was tweeted by a Haryana-based advocate on July 14. This helped verify the authenticity of the claim.
Confirmation from a witness: The expert contacted the advocate who tweeted the video and confirmed that the incident happened in May and was related to bootleggers of illicit liquor. This provided additional evidence to support the authenticity of the claim.
Verification from a police officer: The expert contacted DSP Siwani Suresh Kumar who confirmed that the incident captured in the video was indeed from May. He also clarified that the victim and perpetrators were from the Jat community, not the Jatav and Thakur communities as claimed. This statement from a police officer added credibility to the authenticity of the claim.
News report: The incident was reported by a local newspaper, Danik Bhaskar, on June 1. This news report further supported the authenticity of the claim by providing independent verification of the incident.
